column4: Latest;Preah Sihanouk:  Authorities cracked down on a wildlife meat business in Prey Nop
column5: discovering a variety of live animals and meat.------The raid took place at 4:20 pm on October 17
column9: local police and the Fisheries Administration.------They conducted a search of the house located in Boeung Reang village.------Hundreds of kilos of meat and live rurtles of various species were discovered and legal proceedings will now be started against the house owner.------Huy Bunleng
